name: Castle of the Dice
description:
How To Play??

Move the blue square, using the Arrow Keys! (no WASD) 

Use the Space Key to roll a dice to an enemy.

The enemy will take damage based on what side the dice landed when it was hit by the rolling dice.

There is also something called extra damage, which is useful, and you will obtain it as the game progresses!

The player can move on any tile that has a dark green outline, there is also a walkway on either side of the castle to get from one side of the castle to the other.

The enemies are red squares.
